select count(m.mib_cd) from MINBOUND m join ORDERS o on m.ord_cd = o.ord_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = o.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd
m.mib_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search1},'%') and pr.pro_name like CONCAT('%',#{search2},'%')
and m.mib_date between #{search3} and #{search4} and m.mib_date <= #{search4} and m.mib_date >= #{search3}
and mib_info_status = 0 and mib_info_status = 1

select count(p.pib_cd) from PINBOUND p join PERFORMANCE pe on p.per_cd = pe.per_cd join INSTRUCTION i on pe.ins_cd = i.ins_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = i.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd
p.pib_cd like CONCAT('%',#{search5},'%') and pr.pro_name like CONCAT('%',#{search6},'%')
and p.pib_date between #{search7} and #{search8} and p.pib_date <= #{search8} and p.pib_date >= #{search7}
and pib_info_status = 0 and pib_info_status = 1
mapper.update: update MINBOUND set mib_info_status = 1, mib_date = now() where mib_cd = #{mib_cd}
